nodes.id: 中共十八大后的反腐败

zh-cn: 中共十八大后的反腐败

description.zh-cn: 指2012年11月中共十八大后，由习近平领导的中国共产党发起的一场大规模、持久的惩治政治腐败的政治运动。
description.en: Refers to the large-scale and long-lasting political movement to punish political corruption launched by the Chinese Communist Party led by Xi Jinping after the 18th National Congress of the CCP in November 2012.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第五代领导核心，自2012年起担任中共中央总书记，主导了十八大后的反腐败运动。
description.en: The core leader of the fifth generation of the Chinese Communist Party, serving as General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee since 2012, and has led the anti-corruption campaign after the 18th Party Congress.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十八次全国代表大会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十八次全国代表大会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党于2012年11月召开的全国代表大会，此次会议后开启了大规模的反腐败运动。
description.en: The National Congress of the Chinese Communist Party held in November 2012, after which a large-scale anti-corruption campaign was launched.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党，发起了十八大后的反腐败运动。
description.en: The ruling party of the People's Republic of China, which initiated the anti-corruption campaign after the 18th Party Congress.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央纪律检查委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央纪律检查委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的最高纪律检查机关，是反腐败运动的主要执行机构。
description.en: The highest discipline inspection body of the Chinese Communist Party and the main executive agency of the anti-corruption campaign.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，在2012年至2017年间担任中共中央纪委书记，是反腐运动的主要执行者之一。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as the Secretary of the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection from 2012 to 2017 and was one of the main implementers of the anti-corruption campaign.

description.zh-cn: 前中共中央政治局常委，在反腐运动中被查处，打破了“刑不上常委”的政治惯例。
description.en: A former member of the Politburo Standing Committee of the CCP, who was investigated during the anti-corruption campaign, breaking the political convention that standing committee members are immune from prosecution.

description.zh-cn: 前中共中央政治局委员、中央军委副主席，在反腐运动中被查处。
description.en: A former member of the Politburo of the CCP and Vice Chairman of the Central Military Commission, who was investigated during the anti-corruption campaign.

description.zh-cn: 前中共中央政治局委员、中央军委副主席，在反腐运动中被查处。
description.en: A former member of the Politburo of the CCP and Vice Chairman of the Central Military Commission, who was investigated during the anti-corruption campaign.

description.zh-cn: 前中共中央政治局委员，在反腐运动中被查处。
description.en: A former member of the Politburo of the CCP who was investigated during the anti-corruption campaign.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央政治局常务委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的最高领导机构。
description.en: The highest leadership body of the Chinese Communist Party.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国家监察委员会

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国家监察委员会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高监察机关，于2018年由反腐败运动推动成立。
description.en: The supreme supervisory body of the People's Republic of China, established in 2018 as a result of the anti-corruption campaign.

nodes.id: 中国共产党集体领导制度

zh-cn: 中国共产党集体领导制度

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的一种领导原则和制度。有观点认为该制度在习近平主导的反腐运动后受到削弱。
description.en: A leadership principle and system of the Chinese Communist Party. Some views suggest that this system has been weakened after the anti-corruption campaign led by Xi Jinping.

nodes.id: 中央巡视工作领导小组

zh-cn: 中央巡视工作领导小组

description.zh-cn: 负责协调和指导中共中央巡视工作的机构。
description.en: The body responsible for coordinating and guiding the inspection work of the CCP Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 由中共中央派出，对地方和中央单位进行巡视监督的临时性机构。
description.en: Temporary bodies dispatched by the CCP Central Committee to conduct inspection and supervision of local and central units.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的中央政府。
description.en: The central government of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 涉及中国人民解放军火箭军高层将领的腐败案件，引发外界对习近平反腐成效的讨论。
description.en: A corruption case involving senior generals of the PLA Rocket Force, which sparked discussions about the effectiveness of Xi Jinping's anti-corruption campaign.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十八届中央纪律检查委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十八届中央纪律检查委员会

description.zh-cn: 2012年至2017年期间的中共中央纪律检查委员会，由王岐山担任书记，是反腐运动前五年的主要执行机构。
description.en: The Central Commission for Discipline Inspection of the CCP from 2012 to 2017, headed by Secretary Wang Qishan, was the main executive body for the first five years of the anti-corruption campaign.

relationships.source: 中国共产党第十八次全国代表大会
relationships.target: 中共十八大后的反腐败

description.zh-cn: 该次会议后，以习近平为首的新一届中共中央领导集体开启了大规模的反腐败运动。
description.en: After this congress, the new CCP central leadership collective headed by Xi Jinping launched a large-scale anti-corruption campaign.

relationships.target: 中共十八大后的反腐败

description.zh-cn: 习近平作为中共中央总书记，是此次反腐败运动的发起者和最高领导者。
description.en: As the General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee, Xi Jinping is the initiator and supreme leader of this anti-corruption campaign.

relationships.source: 中国共产党中央纪律检查委员会
relationships.target: 中共十八大后的反腐败

description.zh-cn: 中纪委是该运动的主要执行机构，负责调查党员干部的违纪违法行为。
description.en: The CCDI is the main executive body of the campaign, responsible for investigating disciplinary and legal violations by party officials.

relationships.target: 中共十八大后的反腐败

description.zh-cn: 王岐山在担任中纪委书记期间，负责该运动的日常执行工作。
description.en: During his tenure as Secretary of the CCDI, Wang Qishan was responsible for the daily execution of the campaign.

relationships.target: 中国共产党第十八届中央纪律检查委员会

description.zh-cn: 王岐山在2012年至2017年间担任第十八届中共中央纪律检查委员会书记。
description.en: Wang Qishan served as the Secretary of the 18th Central Commission for Discipline Inspection of the CCP from 2012 to 2017.

relationships.source: 中共十八大后的反腐败

description.zh-cn: 前中共中央政治局常委周永康在运动中被立案审查，成为首位因腐败问题被公开查处的正国级领导人。
description.en: Former Politburo Standing Committee member Zhou Yongkang was investigated during the campaign, becoming the first national-level leader to be publicly prosecuted for corruption.

relationships.source: 中共十八大后的反腐败

description.zh-cn: 前中共中央政治局委员徐才厚是此次反腐运动中落马的高级将领之一。
description.en: Former Politburo member Xu Caihou was one of the high-ranking military officials purged during this anti-corruption campaign.

relationships.source: 中共十八大后的反腐败

description.zh-cn: 前中共中央政治局委员郭伯雄是此次反腐运动中落马的高级将领之一。
description.en: Former Politburo member Guo Boxiong was one of the high-ranking military officials purged during this anti-corruption campaign.

relationships.source: 中共十八大后的反腐败

description.zh-cn: 前中共中央政治局委员孙政才是此次反腐运动中落马的副国级领导人之一。
description.en: Former Politburo member Sun Zhengcai was one of the vice-national level leaders purged during this anti-corruption campaign.

relationships.source: 中共十八大后的反腐败
relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国家监察委员会

description.zh-cn: 此次反腐运动推动了国家监察体制改革，于2018年3月整合相关部门成立了国家监察委员会。
description.en: This anti-corruption campaign promoted the reform of the national supervision system, leading to the establishment of the National Supervisory Commission in March 2018 by integrating relevant departments.

relationships.source: 中共十八大后的反腐败
relationships.target: 中国共产党集体领导制度

description.zh-cn: 有观点认为，反腐运动在客观上加强了习近平的个人权威，导致中共自改革开放以来推行的集体领导制度向个人集权的强人统治回归。
description.en: Some argue that the anti-corruption campaign objectively strengthened Xi Jinping's personal authority, leading to a shift from the collective leadership system implemented since the Reform and Opening-up to a strongman rule of personal power.

relationships.target: 中央巡视工作领导小组

description.zh-cn: 中央巡视组在“中央巡视工作领导小组”的协调下开展工作并向其汇报。
description.en: The Central Inspection Teams operate under the coordination of and report to the Central Leading Group for Inspection Work.

relationships.source: 中央巡视工作领导小组

description.zh-cn: 在担任中纪委书记期间，王岐山领导中央巡视工作领导小组。
description.en: During his tenure as Secretary of the CCDI, Wang Qishan led the Central Leading Group for Inspection Work.

relationships.source: 中共十八大后的反腐败

description.zh-cn: 受反腐行动影响，中华人民共和国政府的国际廉洁指数得分和排名在2014年至2022年期间有所上升。
description.en: Influenced by the anti-corruption campaign, the international Corruption Perception Index score and ranking of the Government of the People's Republic of China improved between 2014 and 2022.

relationships.target: 中共十八大后的反腐败

description.zh-cn: 该案件涉及解放军高层，被部分观察家视为习近平主导的十年反腐工作未能取得根除军队腐败的预期成果。
description.en: This case, involving high-ranking PLA officials, is seen by some observers as an indication that Xi Jinping's decade-long anti-corruption campaign has failed to achieve its intended results in eradicating military corruption.
